google.googleInput: Enter the 6-digit verification code in Google Authenticator
google.iosload: iOS user login App Store search 'Authenticator' download
google.azload: Android users log in to the Google Play or use the mobile browser to search for 'Google Authenticator' downloads.
google.addSecretBackups: Add a key and back up in Google Authenticator
google.scan: Open Google Authenticator App, scan the QR code below or manually enter the key to add a verification token.
google.saveKey: The key is used to retrieve the Google Authenticator when the phone is replaced or lost. Please be sure to save the following key backup before binding.
google.reveal: Check the URL, open the second verification, don't transfer the claim to the HEX staff, and disclose the password information.
google.fishing: Confirm that the URL you are visiting is www.hex.com to prevent being fished.
google.install: Do not install any browser plugins that claim to be related to HEX.
google.call: Do not call any phone that claims to be HEX customer service.
google.revealInfo: Don't reveal passwords, text messages and Google captchas and Google Keys to anyone, including HEX staff.
google.transfer: Do not transfer money to any staff member who claims to be HEX.
google.forbid: For security purposes no withdrawals are permitted for 24 hours after replacement

legalTrad.currencies: If you regularly trade crypto currencies, post your own bitcoin trade ads. If you only want to buy or sell once, we recommend that you place an order directly from the buy or sell list
legalTrad.fee: Users who post the ads pay a 0.5% fee for each completed trade.
legalTrad.advertisement: You must provide your payment details in the trade advertisement or trade chat window.
legalTrad.communication: All communication must be conducted on HEX, and please note the high-risk payment method with fraud risk.
legalTrad.suggested: It is suggested that you communicate with the seller in a timely manner after submitting the trade request. When you mark the trade as 'payment confimation' after the payment is completed, the seller will release the crypto currency after receiving the payment
legalTrad.multiple: Please select the collection account (multiple choice)
legalTrad.clause1: 1、If you regularly trade crypto currencies, post your own bitcoin trade ads. If you only want to buy or sell once, we recommend that you place an order directly from the buy or sell list
legalTrad.clause2: 2、Users who post the ads pay a 0.6% fee for each completed trade.
legalTrad.clause3: 3、You must provide your payment details in the trade advertisement or trade chat window.
legalTrad.clause4: 4、All communication must be conducted on HEX, and please note the high-risk payment method with fraud risk.
legalTrad.Automatically: Automatically reply to the buyer after accepting the order, such as the terms of the transaction, etc
legalTrad.Waiting: Waiting for pay, please pay to
legalTrad.information: 1、Please do not note information such as BTC, USDT, HEX, etc. in the process of transferring, so as to avoid the problem that your remittance is blocked and your bank card is frozen. Therefore, the seller can choose to refuse the trade due to the delay of the payment.
legalTrad.bankcards: 2、Do not use bank cards or Alipay that are not the real name account to transfer money, or the seller can refuse to make a deal and complain
legalTrad.greater: 3、If the trade amount is greater than 50,000 CNY, the payment by bank card after 17:00 on working days or legal holiday days may not be timely. Please pay in batches to ensure timely payment. If the transaction is not timely, the seller has the right to refuse to make a deal.
legalTrad.generated: The order has been generated, please complete the payment in time.
legalTrad.entersend: Please enter text and press enter to send
legalTrad.surecancel: Are you sure to cancel the order?
legalTrad.seller: Is it safe to pay the seller?

help.enter: Please press the 'Enter' button to initiate the search

c2c.Now: Now, redefine the digital asset trading platform with HEX!
c2c.Risk: Risk Warning: Blockchain assets (digital currency and digital equity) trading have extremely high risks (technical defects, skyrocketing, banker manipulation, team disbanding, etc.), HEX provides a free online for blockchain asset lovers The exchange platform does not undertake any review, guarantee, or liability for the investment value of the assets. If you cannot accept it, please be cautious in trading.
c2c.provide: HEX does not provide services to residents of mainland China, the United States, Iran, Cuba, Sudan, Syria and North Korea.
c2c.operate: No longer operate this pending order after removed, and the frozen assets wilCl be thawed.
c2c.unable: Order cancelled, unable to view payment information.
c2c.success: Confirm your payment success. After confirming, your order status will be changed to waiting for the seller to release the coin.
c2c.charged: To be charged, the buyer will be in...
c2c.unablepayment: Order cancelled, unable to view payment information
c2c.1: 请确认您已付款成功，确认后您的订单状态将变更为买方付款成功，等待卖方放币阶段。
c2c.2: 请确认款项已到账再进行操作！
c2c.3: 当您点击确认收款按钮后，您当前订单交易的数字资产将转移到买家账户！
c2c.4: Confirm your payment success. After confirming, your order status will be changed to waiting for the seller to release the coin.
c2c.minimum: Cannot be less than the minimum limit
c2c.maximum: Cannot be greater than the maximum limit
c2c.Cannotmaximum: Cannot be greater than the maximum tradable amount
c2c.Cannottradable: Cannot be greater than the maximum tradable amount
c2c.Cannotavailable: Cannot be greater than the maximum  amount
c2c.intermediate: C2C transaction only after intermediate authentication.
c2c.changed: Can not be changed after setting.
c2c.Appeal: After the appeal, the order status will be changed to “appeal order”, and the customer service will intervene; the buyer and the seller will not be able to operate the order until the appeal is completed.
c2c.quarantine: The current currency coin address does not currently support the quarantine witness address.
